10161.title: Dragon Mask
10161.description:
A Dragon Mask to celebrate Chinese New Year

[color=#40c34b]Having this item in your Steam Inventory means you'll be able to craft it in game. If you sell, trade or break this item you will no longer have this ability in game.[/color]

[color=#5098ce]Breaks down into [color=#ffffff]1 x Cloth[/color][/color]
